name: Christus Santa Rosa Health Care Corporation

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Christus Santa Rosa Health Care Corporation is a General Acute Care Hospital provider based in San Antonio, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $69.1M in Medicaid payments across 740K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $69.1M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
